writeAccessControl can also be removed since this file will be used for read only.

timeline.bodyText:
I would also expect the following methods removed from this file:
writeNativeManagementProtocol https://github.com/wildfly/wildfly-core/pull/4228/files#diff-ae4aaafa96590692ce977218d56e3326R1448
writeHttpManagementProtocol https://github.com/wildfly/wildfly-core/pull/4228/files#diff-ae4aaafa96590692ce977218d56e3326R1467

timeline.bodyText: There are still write methods in this file, however it is supposed to be a read-only parser, see all the write* method names.
